--- Pacifix / Crossroads / Ikoto ---

Pacifix continues into the ship, and heads for the CR chambers, 
yelling behind him, "Don't worry, I would never kill anything in cold 
blood!" Crossroads follows him, a little nervous, but Pacifix' words 
convince him. He stops and approaches Ironhide and 
Sunstreaker, "Don't worry about Pacifix, he'll be ok." 

Meanwhile, up in outerspace above the planet, Azafroth sends another 
thought to ensure that the plan continues. He is getting impatient. 
He directs this thought to Ironhide, the Autobot commander. <<Pacifx 
is right, if we leave the bot in the ship it might do something, and 
possibly ruin the mission. I cannot let that happen. I think I'll 
order Pacifix to bring out the bot, and I'll have Sunstreaker place 
the bot in containment till we can deal with him.>> Azafroth stops 
shimmering, and simply glows. He is getting VERY impatient.
